answerText: Mrs. Ota[10] Kikuji Mitani and Mrs. Ota appear in this novel, named for the pattern on the pink scarf of Yukiko Inamura, the suggested proper bride for Kikuji.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Georgia Tech and Williams | 14 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character's daughter Fumiko runs away near the end of the novel, possibly killing herself as this character does with sleeping pills. For 10 points: [10] Name this tea ceremony fan, who initiates an affair with the much younger Kikuji Mitani in order to prolong her relationship with Kikuji's now-dead father.
